description:
The 22nd edition of Founders Are Happy [Hour] will be dedicated to Founders Founders’ first ever resident, ShiftForward (https://www.shiftforward.eu/). 
We’re going to get to know better Founders Founders beer brewers aka ShiftForward’s team and also learn a thing or two about their digital advertising solutions. Join us for drinks, snacks and for some chat about their tech and business.
name: Founders Are Happy [Hour] #22 at ShiftForward
